title: Competitive Plat/Gold 5v5 League. Looking for Mid and Jungle!
body:
I am finalizing a roster for a team in a plat/gold competitive 5v5 league. This league is for competitive players looking to have some fun in a team 5v5 environment. Teams consist of 2 plat players and 3 gold players. I am looking for a gold level jungler and mid laner to fill our last slots on the team. I can host tryouts asap. The first game is this Monday! The purpose of this league is to offer a fun competitive experience and for gold players to learn more about the game from their plat captains.

LF:
gold midlaner
gold jungler

replies.body: I am a gold jungle player if you need me !
I am currently gold as mid laner, but i was plat last season I dont know if that matters.
Mid Laner here, is your list full?
